'''Festival "Kiban" Store''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Interacting with it will cause the daruma to wobble back and forth.

The blueprint for Festival "Kiban" Store is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest south of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] on Tsurumi Island.
